SELECT a.tdbkSeq ,a.tdbkPayment ,a.tdbkBookingDate ,a.infrMember_ifmmSeq as ifmmSeq ,a.tradTimeTable_tdttSeq as tdttSeq ,a.tdbkTotalCost ,a.tdbkDelNy FROM tradBooking WHERE 1=1 AND a.tdbkSeq = #{tdbkSeq}
